name: Dear Charles — Thinking, Feeling, Creating
description:
This is a short experimental multimedia essay, written to my friend Charles, reflecting on the act of making art. It includes writing, doodles, and music.

DESKTOP USERS

  • Click and drag with the mouse to navigate
  • You can also use the Up and Down arrow keys

This is the third in a series of letters we've been exchanging: Dear Art, Dear Charles.

The music is "She Dreams in Blue" by the awesome and generous Josh Woodward, licensed under the Creative Commons Attribute 4.0 International License.

https://www.joshwoodward.com
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
